org.apache.distributedlog.lock

Interface DistributedLock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NopDistributedLock, ZKDistributedLock

    public interface DistributedLock
extends AsyncCloseable
    Interface for distributed locking

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.distributedlog.io.AsyncCloseable

        CLOSE_FUNC, CLOSE_FUNC_IGNORE_ERRORS, NULL

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<? extends DistributedLock> asyncAcquire()
      Asynchronously acquire the lock.
      void checkOwnership()
      Check if the lock is held.
      void checkOwnershipAndReacquire()
      Check if hold lock.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.distributedlog.io.AsyncCloseable

        asyncClose

    • Method Detail

      • asyncAcquire

        CompletableFuture<? extends DistributedLock> asyncAcquire()
        Asynchronously acquire the lock.
        Returns:
        future represents the acquire result.

      • checkOwnershipAndReacquire

        void checkOwnershipAndReacquire()
                         throws LockingException
        Check if hold lock. If it doesn't, then re-acquire the lock.
        Throws:
        LockingException - if the lock attempt fails
        See Also:
        checkOwnership()

      • checkOwnership

        void checkOwnership()
             throws LockingException
        Check if the lock is held. If not, error out and do not re-acquire. Use this in cases where there are many waiters by default and re-acquire is unlikely to succeed.
        Throws:
        LockingException - if we lost the ownership
        See Also:
        checkOwnershipAndReacquire()
